data.enText: the habit of saving money and spending it carefully so that none is wasted

data.chText: 海石竹（海边野生植物，花鲜艳，呈粉红色）
data.enText: a wild plant with bright pink flowers that grows by the sea/ocean

means: 海石竹(海边野生植物，花鲜艳，呈粉红色)

tr: any of numerous sun-loving low-growing evergreens of the genus Armeria having round heads of pink or white flowers

value.def: Thrift is the quality and practice of being careful with money and not wasting things.

example.ex: They were rightly praised for their thrift and enterprise.
example.tran: 他们勤俭节约，积极进取，得到了当之无愧的赞扬。

value.def: A thrift or a thrift institution is a kind of savings bank.

trans: (为慈善机构募捐而出售旧货的)廉价旧货店
